div.head: 婦人血脈不調
div.div: disharmony in a woman’s blood vessels

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Fu ren xue mai bu tiao

entry.def: disharmony in a woman’s blood vessels

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yue shui bu tiao 月水不調 , menstrual irregularity. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry jing san leng 京三棱：治婦人血脈不調，心腹痛，落胎 , “It cures disharmony in a woman’s blood vessels , pain in heart and abdomen, and premature birth”.
